response.original_title: The Best Years of Our Lives
response.overview: It's the hope that sustains the spirit of every GI: the dream of the day when he will finally return home. For three WWII veterans, the day has arrived. But for each man, the dream is about to become a nightmare.
response.tagline: Three wonderful loves in the best picture of the year!
response.title: The Best Years of Our Lives
